name: MHC Asia Group
description: MHC Asia Group is Singapore’s leading Medical Benefits Administrator and Clinic Network Provider since 1994. We deliver high-quality, cost-effective and transparent corporate healthcare solutions for large corporations, major insurers and even small business enterprises. With over 1,500 clinics in Singapore, employees can have easy access to cashless island-wide medical care. We want to simplify healthcare and connect the stakeholders in the healthcare delivery chain with effective use of information technology and big data analytics — increasing efficiency, ensuring transparency, lowering costs and boosting productivity
Headline: Making Health Connect
ShortDescription: MHC - A BetterHealth Company is a corporate managed healthcare provider with more than 1,500 clinical care touch points in Singapore. A member of HMI Group, MHC’s mission in creating Better Health for our 1 Million corporate employees in Singapore is now being fast tracked.

Highlights.name: Improve Organisational Health
Highlights.description: Receive monthly reports and diagnostic charts on your organisation’s health profile, giving you valuable insights to improve the company’s overall health.

Highlights.name: Contain Healthcare Costs
Highlights.description: With our program, your organisational health expenses can be systematically monitored, empowering you with insights towards effective cost-containment strategies.

Highlights.name: Improve Productivity
Highlights.description: With administrative hassle out of the way, you can focus on what you do best - increasing your productivity and giving you more time for your employees.

enhanced_description: MHC Asia Group, a member of HMI Group, is Singapore’s leading Medical Benefits Administrator and Clinic Network Provider since 1994. Dedicated to creating 'Better Health' for its 1 Million corporate employees in Singapore, the company delivers high-quality, cost-effective, and transparent corporate healthcare solutions for large corporations and major insurers. With an extensive network of over 1,500 clinics island-wide, MHC enables easy access to cashless medical care for employees. The platform leverages information technology and big data analytics, including data visualization capabilities, to simplify healthcare delivery, connect stakeholders, and provide valuable insights. This approach aims to increase efficiency, ensure transparency, lower healthcare costs, boost productivity by reducing administrative burdens, and ultimately improve overall organizational health and employee happiness and engagement through systematic monitoring and diagnostic reporting.
